title: Cabinet composition still not decided, GotaGoGama should continue – Prime Minister
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Newly-appointed Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe said that the GotaGoGama struggle must continue, and he will not intervene with the struggle.
“Police would not do anything to them, and the struggle must continue,” said the Prime Minister during his visit to the Walukaramaya Raja Maha Viharaya in Colombo.
Further, he said he has not decided on the composition of the Cabinet of Ministers.
“There is one, that is GotaGoGama,” he stressed while noting that a solution will be achieved.
He said he will show majority from both sides in parliament.
Cabinet composition still not decided, GotaGoGama should continue – Prime Minister
Looking forward to making Sri Lanka strong again – President congratulates new PM
